2023-12-01.name: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Ransel Girl no Yume o Minai
2023-12-01.desc:
* Based on the 9th volume of the Seishun Buta Yarou light novel series written by Kamoshida Hajime and illustrated by Mizoguchi Keiji.

Finally, the day of Mai's high school graduation has arrived. While Sakuta eagerly waits for his girlfriend, an elementary schooler who looks exactly like her appears before him. Suspicious, and for all the wrong reasons... Meanwhile, Sakuta and Kaede's father suddenly calls, saying that their mother wants to see her daughter. She was hospitalized because Kaede's condition had been too much for her to bear, so what could she possibly want now?

Source: Yen Press

2023-12-03.name: Ran Xia
2023-12-03.desc:
It is said that she will be undefeated when she appears on the stage. This sister is not an easy girl! Shen Dong, who was once the strongest in the sect, now just wants to live a stable life, but the appearance of Xia Tian breaks his peaceful life. This girl who gets into trouble seems to be perverse and unruly, but she is kind and warm at heart. Shen Dong was gradually moved by its influence... At the same time, the conflicts among the four sects continued to escalate. This time, the old and new grudges were settled together!

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2023-12-03.name: Shi Shi Chuanshuo
2023-12-03.desc:
Ye Chong, who grew up alone on an unknown garbage star, accidentally activated a unique artificial intelligence mecha Mu Shang. Although they escaped together from the garbage planet where the star disaster occurred, they were involved in unexpected conspiracies and chaos. How many unknowns are waiting for him in this vast universe?

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2023-12-05.name: Zhen Dao Ge 2nd Season
2023-12-05.desc:
He Fangzhi and Aya followed the clues and finally found the person behind the murder to get rid of Mr. Lin. After that, he went up to Fengming Mountain and was entrusted by the Lord of Feng Pavilion to go to the northwest to rescue someone... Along the way, he met all kinds of people. They either lived in temples or in rivers and lakes. Everyone Everyone has their own choice, they all use their own way, and stick to what they believe in!

source: bgm.tv

2023-12-08.name: Dungeon Meshi
2023-12-08.desc:
When young adventurer Laios and his company are attacked and soundly thrashed by a dragon deep in a dungeon, the party loses all its money and provisions...and a member! They're eager to go back and save her, but there is just one problem: If they set out with no food or coin to speak of, they're sure to starve on the way! But Laios comes up with a brilliant idea: "Let's eat the monsters!" Slimes, basilisks, and even dragons...none are safe from the appetites of these dungeon-crawling gourmands!

Source: Yen Press

Note: The first three episodes received a three-week advance screening run in Japan starting on December 8, 2023. Also, the first episode was screened at AnimagiC Mannheim in Germany on August 5, 2023. The regular broadcast started on January 4, 2024.

2023-12-08.name: Eiga Madogiwa no Totto-chan
2023-12-08.desc:
* Based on an autobiographical memoir written by Kuroyanagi Tetsuko.

This engaging series of childhood recollections tells about an ideal school in Tokyo during World War II that combined learning with fun, freedom, and love. This unusual school had old railroad cars for classrooms, and it was run by an extraordinary man-its founder and headmaster, Sosaku Kobayashi--who was a firm believer in freedom of expression and activity.

Source: Kodansha

2023-12-08.name: Gekijouban Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Shiteshimatta...
2023-12-08.desc: * Based on a light novel series written by Yamaguchi Satoru and illustrated by Hidaka Nami.

2023-12-14.name: Shenyuan Youxi
2023-12-14.desc:
Qiao Jingting, who became a black boxer due to a difficult life, woke up after a traffic accident and found himself in a strange world. The technology here is far higher than his cognition, making people feel like they are in the future, and the people here are like him, their previous memories are stuck at the time of accidental near-death. With concern for his living relatives, Qiao Jingting decided to leave. He soon discovered that this was a game world based on cruel rules. The environment was dangerous and dangerous. Everyone had to strengthen themselves through points. In order to survive, people would do anything to survive. Intrigue and deception. The evil forces headed by Han Bin are entrenched here and become the first barrier in front of Qiao Jingting. After several lives and deaths, Qiao Jing always adhered to the justice in his heart. His belief infected everyone, and he soon gathered companions such as Shu Ai, Bai Er, and Zou Yidao around him. They trust each other, cooperate sincerely, build hope in the cruelty, finally defeat Han Bin, and embark on a journey to uncover the truth behind the "Abyss Game", and they will also face more unknown difficulties and powerful enemies.

source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate

2023-12-15.name: Yaneura no Rudger
2023-12-15.desc:
Born from a young girl's imagination, Rudger is a boy no one can see who lives in a world where imaginations can live and be eaten by others.

Source: Official Website

2023-12-17.name: Xian Wang de Richang Shenghuo Di Si Ji
2023-12-17.desc: Fourth season of Xian Wang de Richang Shenghuo.

2023-12-22.name: Gekijouban Spy x Family Code: White
2023-12-22.desc: * Based on a spy action comedy manga by Endou Tatsuya.

2023-12-25.name: Cong Hong Yue Kaishi
2023-12-25.desc:
The animation "Starting from Red Moon" is adapted from the novel of the same name written by Heishan Laogui. The story tells the story of a blood-red moon suddenly appearing in the sky, which is known as the red moon event in history. The remaining survivors had to hide in the city protected by high walls. Among the survivors, some people also suffered from mental mutations. Among them, those who could not control their own mental mutations would emit mental plague and radiation. It contaminates the normal people around it and poses a great threat to the surviving humans. In order to solve the source of the pollution, High Wall City established a special pollution cleanup department, recruiting people who can control spiritual energy, and our protagonist Lu Xin is applying for the most dangerous cleanup department!

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2023-12-28.name: Pokemon Concierge
2023-12-28.desc:
The story follows Haru, a concierge at the 'Pokémon Resort,' and her interactions with Pokémon and their owners who visit as guests.

Source: netflix

2023-12-30.name: Burn the Witch #0.8: Don`t Judge a Book by Its Cover
2023-12-30.desc:
Historically 72% of all the deaths in London are related to dragons, fantastical beings invisible to the majority of the people. While unknown to most, some people have been standing up to these dragons. Only inhabitants of Reverse London who live in the hidden “reverse” side of London can see the dragons. The protagonists of the story are witch duo Noel Niihashi and Ninny Spangcole. They are protection agents for Wing Bind. Their mission is to protect and manage the dragons within London on behalf of the people.

Source: crunchyroll

2023-12-30.name: Dawang Raoming 2
2023-12-30.desc:
High school student Lu Shu was in a car accident that changed the trajectory of his life. Not only was he unscathed in the car accident, but he also awakened his superpowers! In this era when spiritual energy is resurrected and people are practicing spiritual practice, Lu Shu collects negative energy by "blaming", "irritating" and "choking people", and continues to become stronger by converting negative energy into spiritual resources. With one mouth, he finally Became the most powerful "big devil" on the surface!

source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate
